movie.overview: The King of Far Far Away has died and Shrek and Fiona are to become King & Queen. However, Shrek wants to return to his cozy swamp and live in peace and quiet, so when he finds out there is another heir to the throne, they set off to bring him back to rule the kingdom.
movie.tagline: He's in for the royal treatment.
movie.title: Shrek the Third

cast.name: Christopher Knights
cast.character: Blind Mice / Heckler / Evil Tree #2 / Guard #2 (voice)

cast.name: Sean Bishop
cast.character: Drivers Ed Instructor / Hall Monitor / Teacher (voice)

cast.name: Walt Dohrn
cast.character: Van Student / Xavier / Principal Pynchley / Nanny Dwarf / Evil Knight / Singing Villain (voice)

cast.name: Chris Miller
cast.character: Puppet Master / Announcer / Mascot / Singing Villain (voice)

results.overview: When Duchess Margaret unexpectedly inherits the throne & hits a rough patch with Kevin, it’s up to Stacy to save the day before a new lookalike — party girl Fiona — foils their plans.
results.title: The Princess Switch: Switched Again

results.overview: 15-year-old Mia faces an overwhelming transformation which puts her entire existence into question. Her body is changing radically, and despite desperate attempts to halt the process, Mia is soon forced to accept that nature is far more powerful than she is.
results.title: Blue My Mind

results.overview: Don Felice Sciosciammocca, a poor and simple man, goes to the day, hoping that sooner or later will come the right opportunity to change his life. A nice day at Don Felice comes a parcel from a dear cousin, which contains three pairs of old trousers. Apparently only common value objects, but they will create great surprises.
results.title: Tre Calzoni Fortunati

results.overview: Happy Sciosciammocca has a double life: he plays sacred music in the convent of Rondinelle and teaches music to the educators, at night he goes to Naples where he is known as the actor.
results.title: 'Na Santarella

results.overview: A curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school is forced to remain on campus during Christmas break to babysit the handful of students with nowhere to go. Eventually, he forms an unlikely bond with one of them — a damaged, brainy troublemaker — and with the school’s head cook, who has just lost a son in Vietnam.
results.title: The Holdovers

results.original_title: ウルトラマン コネクションPresents TAMASHII NATIONSスペシャル配信：ウルトラマントリガー編
results.overview: Ultraman Connection Presents: Tamashii Nations Special Streaming featuring Ultraman Trigger is a special filmed stage show based on various Ultraman characters and released on YouTube as a part of the eponymous stream.
results.title: Ultraman Connection Presents: Tamashii Nations Special Streaming featuring Ultraman Trigger

results.overview: In this coming-of-age story, a once-close mother-daughter relationship takes a tumultuous turn as they navigate the challenging journey of growing up. As the daughter blossoms into her own person, clashes between the two ignite like never before, creating an explosive dynamic that forces both to confront their own vulnerabilities and ultimately find a new understanding of each other.
results.title: The Bridge

results.overview: A gutsy crew of Joseon pirates and bandits battle stormy waters, puzzling clues and militant rivals in search of royal gold lost at sea.
results.title: The Pirates: The Last Royal Treasure

results.overview: The PAW Patrol lands on a mysterious dinosaur island after a storm, where they meet Rex, a stranded pup. When Humdinger's reckless mining triggers a volcano, the team faces their biggest rescue mission yet to save the island.
results.title: PAW Patrol: The Dino Movie

results.overview: After a shipwreck, an intelligent robot called Roz is stranded on an uninhabited island. To survive the harsh environment, Roz bonds with the island's animals and cares for an orphaned baby goose.
results.title: The Wild Robot

results.overview: In an effort to prove himself worthy of being a soldier, a young man named Karebet must face off against an angry buffalo, the Queen of the Alligators and a rival and his army.
results.title: The Man from Tingkir

results.overview: Simon, wrecked by a love sorrow, overflows with sadness. He literally starts to shed all the tears of his whole body. Constantly soaked head to foot, he has to face this new physical state that he’s incapable to stop. An encounter will allow him to take a step back from his pain, to point to another perception of sorrow.
results.title: Simon Cries

results.overview: The third installment in the Mortal Kombat franchise. Plot TBA.
results.title: Mortal Kombat III

results.original_title: 仮面ライダーオーズ　クイズとダンスとタカガルバ?!
results.overview: This Hyper Battle Video features the Kangaroo Medal, which is used by Kamen Rider OOO to transform either his arms or legs to have kangaroo-themed powers, resulting in the "Takagaruba" and "Takatoragaru" Combos respectively.
results.title: Kamen Rider OOO: Quiz, Dance, and Takagarooba!?

results.overview: The sequel to the 2007 film. Plot TBA.
results.title: The Simpsons Movie 2

results.original_title: ネット版 仮面ライダーウィザード イン マジか！？ランド
results.overview: To promote the film "Kamen Rider Wizard in Magic Land", Toei released a series of online webisodes, featuring several unbelievable stories. The Kamen Rider Cops films feature past Kamen Riders as part of Rinko's police force. The Kamen Rider Mage films feature Shunpei as the hero. The Search for Magic Riders! looks at past mystically-themed Kamen Riders. The Koyomi's Room: Premium  films show Koyomi's various interests outside of helping Haruto.
results.title: Kamen Rider Wizard in Magica!? Land

results.overview: When a powerful spell turns her parents into giant monsters, a teenage princess must journey into the wild to reverse the curse before it's too late.
results.title: Spellbound

results.overview: The blood-soaked land of Kolar Gold Fields (KGF) has a new overlord now - Rocky, whose name strikes fear in the heart of his foes. His allies look up to Rocky as their Savior, the government sees him as a threat to law and order; enemies are clamoring for revenge and conspiring for his downfall. Bloodier battles and darker days await as Rocky continues on his quest for unchallenged supremacy.
results.title: K.G.F: Chapter 2

results.overview: When a dangerous new troll unleashes devastation across their homeland, Nora, Andreas and Major Kris embark on their most perilous mission yet.
results.title: Troll 2
